original_text: Then they caused all the men outside to become blind. The young men of the city and the old men all became blind. As a result, they could not find the door of the house, even though they tried for some time.
korean_text: 문 밖의 무리를 대소를 막론하고 그 눈을 어둡게 하니 그들이 문을 찾느라고 헤매었더라

sentences.original_text: Then they caused all the men outside to become blind.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러자 그들은 바깥에 있는 모든 남자들을 소경이 되게 했습니다.

sentences.original_text: The young men of the city
and the old men all became blind.
they could not find the door of the house
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 집 문을 찾을 수 없었습니다

sentences.original_text: even though they tried for some time.
